SEARCH
Package dev.Pedro.movies_api.controller

Class LoggingController

java.lang.Object
dev.Pedro.movies_api.controller.LoggingController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/v1/logging") public class LoggingController extends Object
Controller that provides access to application logs.

This controller is mainly intended for administrative use and allows filtered log searching through the LoggingService.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description

  • Method Details

    • searchLogsFilter

      @PostMapping("/search") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<org.bson.Document>> searchLogsFilter(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid SearchLogRequest logRequest)
      Searches application logs using the given filter criteria.

      Only accessible to users with the ADMIN role. The method logs the request parameters for traceability, delegates the search to LoggingService, and returns the results in a ResponseEntity.

      Parameters:
      logRequest - the search filter request, including level, timestamp range, thread, logger, MDC values, keywords, and sorting options
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a list of log entries as Document objects that match the given criteria
